summary:
The Arab world is a region made up of 19 to 22 countries, mostly in West Asia and North Africa. Most people here are Arab, but there are also other ethnic groups like Berbers and Kurds. Arabic is the main language.

This area is diverse, with both rich and poor countries. It has a long history, once ruled by powerful Arab empires. Arab nationalism grew in the 19th century, leading to the formation of the Arab League in 1945, which aims to unite Arab countries.
title: Arab world
